      private static boolean productQuant(OrderProduct product, int storeID)
      Check if a store has enough quantity of a product
      Parameters:
      product - the product to be checked
      storeID - the id of the store
      Returns:
      true if the store has enough quantity of the product, false otherwise

      Returns:

      Parameters:
      order - the order to insert.
